Amila's Blog ...

PSCAD Workflow Automation

The PSCAD Automation Library (AL) was developed in Python to interface with PSCAD and is available to all licensed users of PSCAD at no additional cost. This library interface allows users to call PSCAD functions from a custom script. In this video i explain the process of setting up the work envirolment for PSCAD workflow automation.PyCharm IDE is used to write python code required.
